name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Acting by Attorney General D. Michael Fisher v. parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Acting by Attorney General D. Michael Fisher v. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER.CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 24th day of November,1999, the Orders of the Commonwealth Court are AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER.CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
740 A.2d 1141
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Acting by Attorney General D. Michael Fisher v.
